mapper.select: SELECT vt.id, vt.`name`, vt.pid, vt.`level`, vt.`dv_type`, vt.node_type, vt.create_by, vt.create_time, vt.template_type, vt.SNAPSHOT, vtcm.category_id, cor.time as 'recent_use_time' FROM visualization_template vt LEFT JOIN visualization_template_category_map vtcm ON vt.id = vtcm.template_id left JOIN core_opt_recent cor on cor.resource_type = 6 and vt.id = cor.resource_name ORDER BY vt.create_time DESC
